name: Shield Denver Health Care Center INC

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Shield Denver Health Care Center INC is a Durable Medical Equipment & Medical Supplies provider based in Aurora, CO. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $63.4M in Medicaid payments across 1.0M claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $63.4M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
